ProcessTemplates.Name: Query Microsoft SQL Database and return JSON GET
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process receives an HTTP request, queries data from a Microsoft SQL database based on filters given in the HTTP request, and returns the data as JSON to the caller.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"TableName":{"Value":"\"myTable\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the Microsoft SQL table to be queried. "},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for the Microsoft SQL database."}}

Process.Name: Query Microsoft SQL Database and return JSON GET
Process.Description: This template process receives an HTTP request, queries data from a Microsoft SQL database based on filters given in the HTTP request, and returns the data as JSON to the caller.
